name: Improvado Inc.
description: Developer of an online middleware software designed to integrate and aggregate data from social platforms all in one place. The company's software gathers all the data from a range of social and business platforms together within a single access point and makes it simple to view and access marketing data in real time, enabling marketers and businesses to make informed decisions in an efficient manner.
one_liner: Developer of an online middleware software designed to integrate and aggregate data from social platforms all in one place. The company's software gathers all the data from a range of social and business platforms together within a single access point and makes it simple to view and access marketing data in real time, enabling marketers and businesses to make informed decisions in an efficient manner.
